product_name: Camaro Titanium Long John Wetsuit - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Camaro Titanium Long John Wetsuit provides great warmth through your torso and legs while leaving your arms uncovered for excellent range of motion while swimming and surfing. 3mm open-cell SCS titanium neoprene keeps you warm in mild water temperatures. Titanium neoprene material greatly improves drying times-shake it out once and it is dry! Seams are glued and blind-stitched for water tightness. Zipperless design features shoulder rip-and-stick patches for comfort and ease of getting in and out. Stirrups keep legs down and tucked into booties. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Camaro Titanium Long John Wetsuit provides great warmth through your torso and legs while leaving your arms uncovered for excellent range of motion while swimming and surfing.
